citations.narrative:
At time of inspection at Dellosso Farms in Lathrop, California, they did not possess a valid USDA license to exhibit
animals. Delloso Farms canceled its previous license as it had only been exhibiting farms animals, but a Plains Zebra was
on exhibit during the inspection. A Zebra is considered exotic hoof stock requiring a license. Conducting unlicensed
activity of regulated animals does not allow for appropriate oversight and enforcement of the Animal Welfare Act. No
person shall operate as a dealer or exhibitor without a valid license. Correct by obtaining an appropriate license.
Correct by: 12 Feb 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative
Additional Inspectors:
KATHARINE FRANK, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
At time of inspection at Dellosso Farms in Lathrop, California, they did not possess a valid USDA license to exhibit 
animals. Delloso Farms canceled its previous license as it had only been exhibiting farms animals, but a Plains Zebra was 
on exhibit during the inspection. A Zebra is considered exotic hoof stock requiring a license. Conducting unlicensed 
activity of regulated animals does not allow for appropriate oversight and enforcement of the Animal Welfare Act. No 
person shall operate as a dealer or exhibitor without a valid license. Correct by obtaining an appropriate license. 
Correct by: 12 Feb 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KATHARINE FRANK, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
